Syllabus:

  1. Vocabulary – Improves word building hence can speak without breakage.

          * Meanings and sentences

          * Idioms and sentences

          * Synonyms and sentences

          * Antonyms and sentences

  1. Grammar – helps to project ideas clearly and not create confusion for the listener.
  • Tenses
  • Verb
  • Subject-Verb agreement
  • Preposition
  1. Story telling – Improves strategic thinking and also makes an impact on others by your way of speaking.
  • Comedy
  • Tragedy
  • Moral based
  • Autobiography
  1. Product selling – Improves effective communication and negotiation skills
  • Electronic goods
  • Household items
  • Tourism package
  • Flats
  • Beauty products
  • Outfits/dresses
  1. News recital – improves the development of speech, expression of feelings and stage confidence.
  • Political news
  • Business news
  • General news
  • Entertainment news
  1. Drama Presentation – improves voice projection and articulation of words
  • Moral based

Duration: One and half months 

 

For Public Speaking, Sales Pitch, Project Presentation:

  1. Elocution – Improves spoken communication
  • Entertaining
  • Motivational
  • Persuasive
  • Informative
  1. Debate – Improves critical thinking skills, ability to make reasonal and well thought out arguments in addition to questioning.
  • General topics concerning the public
  1. Extempore – Improves voicing ideas with precision and oral communication skills.
  • Topics related to field will be given on the spot

Duration: One month                                                                  

Mock Interview:-

Duration: Fifteen days
